jdbc-user-service.users-by-username-query: SELECT u.user_name, u.password, enabled FROM users u WHERE u.user_name = ?
jdbc-user-service.authorities-by-username-query: SELECT u.user_name, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_role ur ON ur.user = u.id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role = r.id INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role=r.id INNER JOIN permissions p ON r.id = rp.permission WHERE u.user_name = ?
